attributes.action: AUGUST 2007....Give British Citizens - the ENGLISH, Irish, Scots and Welsh - the vote on Europe that this Labour Government PROMISED us on the present Euro Consitution/treaty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What IS your problem with giving British Citizens the right to vote on the constitution/treaty on Europe? It was this Labour Government that PROMISED us a refendum on the present Euro Consitution/treaty.  What are you afraid of?  Why are you letting the Electorate down on your pledges? How is ANYBODY supposed to trust you if you dont give us a vote!!?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
